newsitem.title: USA: Bankers Trust files shelf for $500 mln debt.
newsitem.headline: Bankers Trust files shelf for $500 mln debt.

text.p: Bankers Trust New York Corporation said Wednesday it filed a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to $500 million in debt.
The registration includes junior subordinated debentures due 2036 and trust preferred securities, the filing said.
Proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, the filing said.
Bankers Trust New York Corp is a bank holding company, incorporated under the laws of the state of New York in 1965.
